Class EmailService.EmailMessageResult

public class EmailService.EmailMessageResult

Wrapper class for Messaging.SendEmailResult. Class contains exception and error handling methods.

Methods

public List<Messaging.SendEmailError> getErrors()

Gets the errors that occurred during the send transaction.

Returns:
    Errors occurred during the sendEmail method.

public Boolean hasException()

Checks if the send transaction has an exception.

Returns:
    True if an exception occurred.

public Boolean isSuccess()

Checks if the send transaction was successful.

Returns:
    Indicates whether the email was successfully submitted for delivery (true) or not (false).
